channel.title: Nividia
channel.description:
Can someone help me get the nividia client to run with my server? I have portforwarded (utorrent) No-ip DUC is running Server cmd is online and working Changed what i think would be the client ip.
It still fails. can someone help? i have teamviewer if needed

item.title: Nividia
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

the ip which the client is connecting with is usually placed in one of the following:

Client.java (in client folder)
EGUI.java
GUI.java

if client.java then hit CTRL + F, then look for “server =” and change the ip to your no-ip IP Adress.

If the EGUI.java of GUI.java then open it and do CTRL + F and look for “ip =” then change it to your no-ip IP Adress. then recompile and good.

Read full topic

item.title: Nividia
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:395374”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=492559.msg3602700#msg3602700 date=1305760485]

What exactly is the error?

There is no error, the server boots up correctly. so does the client. but then i try and log in. the usual Error connecting to server message is displayed.
When someone get’s on that said they can help, ill send my tv info
[/quote]

Does their client have the correct IP?[/quote]
I cant tell. theres like 5 areas with an ip address

Read full topic

item.title: Nividia
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:395374”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=492559.msg3601354#msg3601354 date=1305596363]
Can someone help me get the nividia client to run with my server?
I have portforwarded (utorrent)
No-ip DUC is running
Server cmd is online and working
Changed what i think would be the client ip.

It still fails. can someone help? i have teamviewer if needed
[/quote]

utorrent doesn’t forward anything. If anything it just adds an exception to the firewall at the machine level. You still need to forward your router.[/quote]
I did forward the router. canyouseeme.org says it can see me on port 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: Nividia
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:1, topic:395374”]Can someone help me get the nividia client to run with my server?
I have portforwarded (utorrent)
No-ip DUC is running
Server cmd is online and working
Changed what i think would be the client ip.

It still fails. can someone help? i have teamviewer if needed[/quote]

utorrent doesn’t forward anything. If anything it just adds an exception to the firewall at the machine level. You still need to forward your router.

Read full topic
